question: What was the main purpose of appointing Philip Duff committee?
option1: To examine the issue of the merger of Odiya-speaking areas
option3: Making hindi as the state language of Odisha
answer: To examine the issue of the merger of Odiya-speaking areas
explanation: The main purpose of appointing the Philip Duff committee was to examine the issue of the merger of Odiya-speaking areas (Ganjam).
